WorkItem.Description:
Steps to recreate bug
1. Click "File" menu
2. Click "Load from Battle.Net..." 
3. Input Region, realm and character
4. Click OK
5. Error window appears, and loading windows is stuck on "Downloading Character Data..."
 
Silverlight 4.0.60531.0
 
Error report:
I have performed the Suggested Fix and continue to receive this error. If I am posting this message without having performed the Suggested Fix I am aware that I am consuming the Developer(s) time in managing my Issue unnecessarily.
 
== Version: 4.2.0.0 ==
 
== Error Message ==
 
[Arg_SecurityException]
Arguments: 
Debugging resource strings are unavailable. Often the key and arguments provide sufficient information to diagnose the problem. See http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=106663&Version=4.0.60531.0&File=mscorlib.dll&Key=Arg_SecurityException
